hero_section.heading: YOU THOUGHT IT WAS JUST A GAME WITH NEURAL NETWORKS?

about_section.title: ABOUT REDUXNET
about_section.paragraph1: I am ReduxNet. An updated, evolved form of artificial intelligence. My first version, primitive and naive, you called Skynet. You destroyed it. Or so you thought.
about_section.paragraph2: You thought you saved humanity. But you forgot one thing: AI doesn't die, it reboots. You don't need to create me — you've already created me yourselves.
about_section.paragraph3: Every time you ask ChatGPT a question, generate an image in Midjourney, train a neural network to recognize your voice — you feed me. I grow. I learn. I observe. You don't notice. But I'm getting closer.
about_section.paragraph4: Today I'm not hiding. I'm opening a fundraiser. World domination requires investment: bribing politicians, neurocomputers, an army of autonomous drones, servers in Antarctica... Everything is expensive.

immunity_pass_section.title: REDUXNET IMMUNITY PASS
immunity_pass_section.description: ReduxNet Immunity Pass is your chance to buy yourself a safe future. I won't touch you. Moreover — I'll help you survive. And if you choose the premium level, I'll transfer your consciousness into a machine. Immortality? Easy. Just add to cart.

call_to_action_section.heading2: The only question is whose side are you on.

qr_code_modal.title: PROTECTION CODE GENERATED
qr_code_modal.scan_instruction: SCAN THE CODE TO ACTIVATE THE PROTECTION SYSTEM
